Articles.Content: I think Duna's old atmosphere stopped around 40 or 41km, it is definitely 50km now. I noticed it when I attempted a landing and confirmed it when I ascended again. You still need to dip pretty low for aerobraking though.
Is the ingame information on map mode correct(ed)?

I thought that in 0.25 and other versions it started at 50km... at least on the info tab in 0.25 it said 50km, I never tried it hands-on. It seems that the atmospheres in 1.0 start exactly where the info tab tells you they start. In 0.25, the info tab said Jool had a 200km atmosphere, but it only started way lower. Good to see the info panel doesn't lie to me anymore.
